luckmanmod:LuckyCoin.NAME: Lucky Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b2, draw #b1 card and gain [E] .

luckmanmod:SuperLuckyCoin.NAME: Super Lucky Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL You are always Lucky. You cannot play more than #b3 cards per turn.

luckmanmod:UnluckyCoin.NAME: Unlucky Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL You cannot be Lucky.
